title: Leetnotion
description: LeetNotion brings a new level to LeetCode practice right in VS Code! 🎉 Get daily problems, curated sheets (like NeetCode & Grokking Coding Interview Patterns), auto check-in for coins, Easter egg collection, and custom solution headers/footers. Plus, seamless Notion sync to track submissions, notes, review dates, and more. Includes a free Notion template with all LeetCode problems and sheets. Elevate your coding journey with LeetNotion—available now on the VS Code marketplace!
